flawed_nl_solution:
Peter has 19 - 7 = <<19-7=12>>12 years of experience.
Robert has 12 - 4 = <<12-4=8>>8 years of experience.
Mike has 8 - 2 = <<8-2=3>>3 years of experience.
Tom has 2 * 8 = <<2*8=16>>16 years of experience.
Roger has 12 + 8 + 3 + 16 = <<12+8+3+16=39>>39 years of experience.
Roger has to work another 50 - 39 = <<50-39=11>>11 years before he retires.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 3. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
